title.narrative: Investing in clean water and sanitation in schools

description.narrative: This grant is part of a global program on WASH in schools that will deliver results and impact at various levels, both direct improvements in access to WASH for students, and by contributing to more long-term changes in national and global policies. Service delivery and national advocacy work will be implemented in Tanzania, Ethiopia, Uganda, Pakistan and India, and involve the two regional teams of East Africa and South Asia. Regional teams will deliver on research and advocacy and support CPs.

activity-date.narrative: Date that project is due to end

mailing-address.narrative: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
